title: Gene Watson Sings His Greatest Hits (2006) DVDRip x264 AC3
description:
This stunning performance was recorded live at the Church Street Station Theatre in Orlando, Florida circa 1984. "The world stops spinning when he sings," marvels Robert K. Oermann, the dean of country critics. "In his voice is all the ache of existence." In 1974 Watson's steamy single Love In The Hot Afternoon made the Top 10 and ignited a firestorm of hits. Here Gene Watson, a real singer's singer, puts on one of his trademark breath-taking performances. 


Track List:
1. 14 Carat Mind
2. No One Will Ever Know
3. Take Off Them Shoes
4. Speak Softly, Your Talking To My Heart
5. Farewell Party
6. You're Out Doin' What I'm Here Doin' Without
7. Nothing Sure Looks Good On You
8. What She Don't Know Won't Hurt Her
9. Pick The Wildwood Flowers
10. Should I Go Home (Or Should I Go Crazy)
11. Love In The Hot Afternoon

The source DVD was quite poor but it's quite presentable after running it through QTGMC... better than the dvd, really. Unfortunately the audio is only mono AC3 but the performances are great so it's worth a download if you're a Gene Watson fan
